---
title: "Run Example Data"
output: html_document

The example data are comprised of TPM (transcripts per kilobase million) normalised expression profiles from 18 primary, grade IV, GBM tumour samples obtained from [The Cancer Genome Atlas (TGCA) Study of Glioblastoma](https://www.cancer.gov/about-nci/organization/ccg/research/structural-genomics/tcga/studied-cancers/glioblastoma)
